Two ways to get a loan

Whether you need a loan from a business or someone you know, we've got you covered.

Business Lenders

Browse registered business lenders on our platform. Submit a request, wait for approval, and start tracking your loan with professional terms.

  • Verified businesses
  • Clear interest rates
  • Professional support

Friends & Family

Send an invite link to anyone. They can accept your loan request without creating an account. Keep personal finances clear and organized.

  • No account required for lender
  • Instant invites via email
  • Preserve relationships

How it works

Get started in under 2 minutes

01

Choose lender type

Select between a business lender or someone from your personal network

02

Enter loan details

Specify the amount, purpose, and your preferred repayment schedule

03

Wait for acceptance

Your lender reviews and accepts (or suggests changes to) the terms

04

Track & repay

Both parties track progress with a visual timeline. No surprises.

Everything you need to manage loans

Built with features that make loan tracking simple and stress-free

Payment Schedules

Automatic payment schedule generation based on your preferred frequency - weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly.

Smart Reminders

Email notifications before payments are due. Never miss a payment or forget to follow up.

Visual Progress

See exactly how much has been paid and what remains with clear progress indicators.

Multiple Payment Methods

Support for PayPal, Cash App, and Venmo. Set your preferred method for easy payments.

Secure & Private

Your loan information stays between you and your lender. We never share your data.

Clear Communication

Both parties see the same information. No misunderstandings about amounts or due dates.

Built on Trust

Why people love Feyza

We created Feyza because lending money to friends and family shouldn't be awkward. Clear records make for clear relationships.

No awkward conversations

Automated reminders do the asking for you. No more uncomfortable follow-ups.

Everyone stays on the same page

Both borrower and lender see the exact same payment schedule and history.

Documentation when you need it

If questions arise, you have a clear record of every agreement and payment.
